extension_extended_description.message: Prevents YouTube™ videos from starting to play automatically when you open them. Doesn't affect ads so it's better to use together with an Ad-Blocking extension like uBlock Origin. Doesn't stop sutoplaying in playlists.

ba_click2disable.message:
YouStopper is Enabled.
Click to disbale.

ba_click2enable.message:
YouStopper is Disabled.
Click to enable.
